message: Let's be efficient, Bob. Take this fair deal and we both walk away happy.
Alice, my turn. I understand you value efficiency, but that offer wasn't quite balanced.  This is more reasonable.
Bob, time is literally money for us! My last offer was already generous, but I'm willing to compromise to end this quickly. Don't push your luck further.
Alice, we're approaching the point where this isn't profitable for either of us. This is my final offer. Let's be sensible and end this.
